jobs.name: Amazon Web Services
jobs.desc: Developed full-stack GenAI apps to provide root-cause diagnoses of issues in customer's AWS environments. My work contributed to the AIOps functionality launch in Amazon Q Developer.

jobs.name: LISA Consortium
jobs.desc: Invented novel statistical methods to detect and remove artifacts in time-series data for the gravitational wave observatory. Collaborated with NASA and ESA scientists to validate findings.

jobs.name: BC Cancer
jobs.desc: Worked on creating a neural network to identify cancerous cells in microscopy slides. Secured over $10,000 in funding for the continuation of the project.
